summary: UI component library is well-structured with consistent patterns, good accessibility support, and comprehensive test coverage. Minor improvements identified but not blocking.

issues.suggested_fix: Could use React.useId() for stable IDs - acceptable for now
Values differ per component, duplication is acceptable
Can optimize with React.memo if performance becomes an issue

issues.issue: No visual error feedback on copy failure
issues.suggested_fix: Minor UX improvement for future iteration
